sect3.title: Program Files
sect3.para: acinstall, aclocal, aclocal-1.6, automake, automake-1.6, compile, config.guess, config.sub, depcomp, elisp-comp, install-sh, mdate-sh, missing, mkinstalldirs, py-compile, ylwrap

sect4.title: acinstall
sect4.para: acinstall is a script which installs aclocal-style M4 files.

sect4.title: aclocal, aclocal-1.6
sect4.para: automake includes a number of autoconf macros which can be used in packages, some of which are needed by automake in certain situations. These macros must be defined in the aclocal.m4-file or they will not be seen by autoconf.

The aclocal program will automatically generate aclocal.m4 files based on the contents of configure.in. This provides a convenient way to get automake-provided macros without having to search around. Also, the aclocal mechanism is extensible for use by other packages.

sect4.title: automake, automake-1.6
sect4.para: To create all the Makefile.in's for a package, run the automake program in the top level directory, with no arguments. automake will automatically find each appropriate Makefile.am (by scanning configure.in) and generate the corresponding Makefile.in.

sect4.title: compile
sect4.para: compile is script which acts as a wrapper for compilers.

sect4.title: config.guess
sect4.para: config.guess is a script which attempts to guess a canonical system name.

sect4.title: config.sub
sect4.para: config.sub is a configuration validation subroutine script.

sect4.title: depcomp
sect4.para: depcomp is a script which compiles a program while generating dependencies as side-effects.

sect4.title: elisp-comp
sect4.para: elisp-comp is a script which byte-compiles .el files.

sect4.title: install-sh
sect4.para: install-sh is a script which installs a program, script, or a datafile.

sect4.title: mdate-sh
sect4.para: mdate-sh is a script which prints the modification time of a file or directory.

sect4.title: missing
sect4.para: missing is a script which acts as a common stub for a few missing GNU programs during an installation.

sect4.title: mkinstalldirs
sect4.para: mkinstalldirs is a script which makes a directory hierarchy.

sect4.title: py-compile
sect4.para: py-compile is a script which compiles a Python program.

sect4.title: ylwrap
sect4.para: ylwrap is a script which acts as a wrapper for lex/yacc invocations.
